title: mysql beta regression

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-beta
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to beta.

body:
All crates that depend on [mysql](https://crates.io/crates/mysql) of various versions can't compile right now. Crater couldn't pick this up as root regression because this is probably a monomorphisation time error or something.

The error ([example log](https://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/stable-1.19-beta-1.20.0-beta.1/beta-2017-07-18/reg/dbench-0.1.0/log.txt)):
```
error: type `io::IoPack + 'static` is private
    --> /cargo-home/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/mysql-8.0.0/src/conn/mod.rs:1043:35
     |
1043 |         let (data, seq_id) = try!(self.get_mut_stream().as_mut().read_packet(old_seq_id));
     |                                   ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

```
cc @blackbeam

Versions that crates depend on:

* v10.0.0 ([dbench](https://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/stable-1.19-beta-1.20.0-beta.1/beta-2017-07-18/reg/dbmigrate-0.3.4/log.txt), [dbmigrate](https://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/stable-1.19-beta-1.20.0-beta.1/beta-2017-07-18/reg/dbmigrate-0.3.4/log.txt), [dbmigrate-lib](https://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/stable-1.19-beta-1.20.0-beta.1/beta-2017-07-18/reg/dbmigrate-lib-0.1.1/log.txt), [mysql-repo](https://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/stable-1.19-beta-1.20.0-beta.1/beta-2017-07-18/reg/mysql-repo-0.1.0/log.txt))
* v8.0.0 ([r2d2_mysql](https://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/stable-1.19-beta-1.20.0-beta.1/beta-2017-07-18/reg/r2d2_mysql-8.0.0/log.txt))
* v11.1.0([https://github.com/0xpr03/yayd#edf4e83a7a922c8069eef8dd0d0320dbc61d2ff4](https://cargobomb-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/stable-1.19-beta-1.20.0-beta.1/beta-2017-07-18/gh/0xpr03.yayd.edf4e83a7a922c8069eef8dd0d0320dbc61d2ff4/log.txt))
